wikipedia_page.main: Lewis MacDonald MacLeod (June 1885 – 12 November 1907, Cambridge) was a Scottish rugby union player.He was capped six times for Scotland between 1904–5. He also played for Cambridge University RFC. He was a centre.He was the brother of Ken MacLeod who was also capped for Scotland.He died young at only 22.

response: He was the brother of Lewis MacLeod who was also capped for Scotland.
*Lewis MacLeod (rugby union) (1885–1907), Scottish rugby union player
